TextView.android:text: You are invited to participate in a study conducted by the Endometriosis Society of Bangladesh. It is an institution of gynecologists.Menstruation is a normal physical process in the life ofevery girl.A number of teenage girls experience abnormal pain in the lower abdomen during menstruation.In future, this pain may lead to the symptoms of a disease called Endometriosis. This pain may increase her physical and mental sufferings day by day that could cause harm to her reproductive life, academic studies, professional activities etc.The research is aimed at raising awareness. The purpose of this research is to collect information about lower abdominal pain during menstruation. Thisresearchwill ask you some questions about menstrual health and lower abdominal pain during menstruation. If necessary, your disease might be diagnosed through ultrasound in lower abdomen and there is no risk toyourphysicalandmental health.Based on the information gathered from this research, an awareness program will be conducted at later time under the leadership of a team of gynecologists.However, you can withdraw yourself from this studywhenever you want.You will neverlikely to takeany physicaland mental risk for participatingin this study. All of your information will remain strictly confidential.The results of this research will make your future life happier, ensure your reproductive health and will also help to protect the health of all women in Bangladesh and abroad.
Are you willing to take part in this Research?
